productDescription:
This item is handmade by Lara in Zeeland and will be made after your order. 
The clothes are made- to - order to reduce overproduction and waste.

optionalInfo.fit:
The TWILL shirt has a slichtly oversized fit. Alexander wears size M-tall and is 187cm.

Sizes in CM:
XS (-Tall): Chest circumference 96cm, length 61cm (71cm)
S (-Tall): Chest circumference 104cm, length 62cm (72cm)
M (-Tall): Chest circumference 112cm, length 63cm (73cm)
L (-Tall): Chest circumference120cm, length 64cm (74cm)
XL (-Tall): Chest circumference 128cm, length 65cm (75cm)

​​​​​​​
optionalInfo.care: Hand wash this piece, don’t bleach it, let it line dry, don’t use chemicals while cleaning/washing and iron between 1-2 points.
optionalInfo.production:
This item is handmade by Lara in Zeeland and will be made after your order. 
The clothes are made- to - order to reduce overproduction and waste.
optionalInfo.additionalNotes: The short is handmade and will be made after your order. Therefore the delivery time will take between 3-6 days on average.
